attributes.comment:
I am very concerned about the proposed increase in the application fee for the I-
600A. As a waiting adoptive parent, we have already applied once to receive our I-
171H. Because we are going through China, due to the recent slow down there
we will have to RE-submit our I-600A. Chinese adoptees represent the majority of
orphans adopted by American Parents, almost all of whom will now have to file at
least two I-600A's before receiving their child. Already cost prohibitive, your price
increase of $145 including biometrics will cause many prospective parents to be
unable to continue. I would think that getting $545 plus $140 for new fingerprints
from almost 6000 re-applicants would more than cover any needed funding
increases. Please re-consider this cost increase as it will hurt many waiting
families.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cynthia W. Godsey
